full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL PO SKU LNGA'I BSANG MCHOD BDE CHEN CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES RGYAL PO SKU LNGA'I BSANG MCHOD BDE CHEN CHAR 'BEB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BTZUN CHUNG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS MKHAS GRUB DAM PA RNAMS KYIS GSUNG 'GA' ZHIG LA BRTEN PAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI LHA BRIS PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN NO, ,'DI YI DGE BAS CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO 'KHOR BCAS KYIS RTAG TU BSRUNG SKYOB MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
